original_title: Ni olvido ni perdón: 1972, la masacre de Trelew
overview: On August 15, 1972, during the dictatorial government of General Lanusse, twenty political prisoners belonging to the PRT- ERP, FAR and Montoneros, escaped from Rawson prison in the Patagonian province of Chubut.
title: Don't Forget, Don't Forgive
